input_text:
Job Title: Electrical Engineer – Unlock Your Potential with Career Growth

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Electrical Engineer – Unlock Your Potential with Career Growth Opportunity**

Are you a motivated and detail-oriented Electrical Engineer looking to take your career to the next level? Our client is a leading professional and technical services firm with a team of over 60 professionals, serving clients across 25 states. Join a dynamic company where career progression is not just a possibility, but a promise as they continue to expand their reach. Here, you will have the chance to work alongside seasoned professionals with over 30 years of experience on innovative projects such as chiller plants, boiler plants, HVAC renovations, and more.

Benefits:** – **Hybrid Work Schedule:** Enjoy the flexibility of a hybrid work schedule that allows you to maintain work-life balance. – **Professional Development:** Work with a team of industry veterans who can mentor and guide you towards becoming a project leader. – **Expansion Opportunities:** Be part of a company that is actively growing, giving you the opportunity to advance in your career.Responsibilities:** – **Conduct Electrical Design Functions:** Utilize your skills in equipment selection, load calculations, and product specifications to contribute to the success of various projects. – **Prepare Technical Reports:** Showcase your ability to develop drawings, technical specifications, and reports that meet regulatory and industry code requirements. – **Collaborate Across Disciplines:** Work collaboratively with colleagues from different disciplines to create innovative and effective technical solutions for clients.Requirements:** – **Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering:** Utilize your educational background to tackle complex engineering tasks and contribute to the success of projects. – **7-15 years of Experience:** Leverage your experience to bring valuable insights and expertise to the team. – **Familiarity with Electrical Design Software:** Demonstrate your proficiency in software applications to streamline design processes and enhance project outcomes.

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting (https://www.nonstopconsulting.com), for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Electrical Engineer
output_json.summary: Join a leading professional and technical services firm as an Electrical Engineer with opportunities for career growth.
output_json.company_information: NonStop is a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US.

other.content: Please share any disability or condition that could affect the application and interview process.
